If those cases are confirmed as suicides- and officials said they usually are- that rate would be higher than the 16 combat deaths reported last month in Iraq and Afghanistan. The trend and trajectory seen in January further heightens the seriousness and urgency that all of us must have in preventing suicides, Army Vice Chief of Staff Colin Powell Peter Chiarelli said.
